snippet.title: Death or Treat: Teaser Trailer Official || Saona Studios
snippet.description:
“Death or Treat” by Saona Studios is an action musou rogue-lite 2D with traditional animations and handpainted environments. You will play as Scary, the owner of Ghost Mart, leader in manufacturing candies for Halloween.

We still working on the game but here you can see a small preview.

Are you ready to make Halloween great again?

Wishlist on Steam: tinyurl.com/238frtat
And keep in touch with our social media: 
https://twitter.com/SaonaStudios
https://www.instagram.com/saonastudios/
https://www.tiktok.com/@saona.studios
